keyword: how many calories are in a bratwurst sausage
title: How Many Calories Are in a Bratwurst Sausage?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a bratwurst sausage, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Bratwurst Sausage?
assumptions: Standard pork bratwurst, cooked (grilled or boiled), about 85g per link, no bun, condiments, or added fats.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type (pork/beef/veggie), cooking method, and size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical bratwurst sausage has about 290 kcal and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Chicken or turkey bratwurst (lower fat version)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a bratwurst sausage?
faqs.a: About 290 kcal for one standard cooked pork bratwurst.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a bratwurst?

faqs.a: Yes, around 800 mg sodium per sausage due to seasoning.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in bratwurst?
faqs.a: Grilling or boiling keeps calories lower; frying adds 40+ kcal from oil.
Opt for chicken or turkey varieties, which can reduce calories by 80 kcal per sausage.
